meanings.definition: The act of applying turpentine to something.
meanings.sent1: I watched the turpentining of the wooden chair to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent2: The turpentining of the canvas brought out the vibrant colors of the painting.
meanings.sent3: The turpentining of the old door made it smell like a pine forest.
meanings.sent4: Her turpentining of the floor with care made it gleam like a polished mirror.
meanings.sent5: The turpentining of the table made it look brand new and fresh.

meanings.definition: The process of extracting turpentine from pine trees.
meanings.sent1: The turpentining of the pine trees was a labor-intensive task in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Workers used traditional methods for turpentining to collect the valuable resin.
meanings.sent3: During the turpentining season, the forest was filled with the scent of pine.
meanings.sent4: The turpentining process was crucial for obtaining raw materials for various products.
meanings.sent5: The turpentining industry provided employment for many in the rural areas.
